articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy hints at an ‘agentic’ Alexa - TechCrunch
articles.description: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy hinted at an improved, "agentic" version of the company's Alexa assistant during Amazon's Q3 2024 earnings call.
articles.content:
Amazon CEO Andy Jassy on Thursday hinted at an improved, “agentic” version of the company’s Alexa assistant one that could take actions on a user’s behalf.
“I think that the next generation of these… [+1394 chars]

articles.author: Greg Wehner
articles.title: NASA reconnects with interstellar Voyager 1 spacecraft using technology not used in decades - Fox News
articles.description: NASA reconnected with Voyager 1, which is located nearly 15 billion miles away from Earth, after a brief pause that triggered the spacecraft's fault protection system.
articles.content: After a brief pause in communications with Voyager 1, NASA re-established a connection with the interstellar spacecraft located more than 15 billion miles away from Earth, using a frequency not used … [+3065 chars]
